Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inspectable, java.io.Serializable, Nameable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Battery, Bomb, CD, CDPlayer, Door, Food, Lightsource, WaterPipe

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements Nameable, Inspectable, java.io.Serializable
    An item. Has a name and a description. Must be extended to create actual Items.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
